PIN.values: |RGB is most common color encoding format. You can always can find exact RGB description of any color.&cr;&lf;Avoid to manually add ''looking like'' colors.|
|Name R (Color) after color actual name (you can faster find it in R list)&cr;&lf;Name shades after: COLOR_shade|
|_MAIN is for main color&cr;&lf;Using _Main color will safe your time - no need to change Update, Idle and some other modules&cr;&lf;_SECOND is for supporting color|
|2. Create S for each color and _MAIN and _SECOND colors|
|Delete the comments, when working on your own app|
